front.title: TCPLS: Modern Transport Services with TCP and TLS

abstract.t: This document specifies a protocol leveraging TCP and TLS to provide modern transport services such as multiplexing, connection migration and multipath in a secure manner. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/mpiraux/draft-piraux-tcpls.
